parties: NATIONAL FOOTBALL MUSEUM, INC., an Ohio non-profit corporation, doing business as Pro Football Hall of Fame ("PFHOF"), HOF Village Media Group, LLC (the "Village Media Company"), a Delaware limited liability company that is a wholly-owned subsidiary of HOF Village, LLC, a Delaware limited liability company ("HOFV") and, solely for purposes of Section 4.5, HOFV; each a "Party"

termination_clause.text: termination or expiration of this Agreement, the Village Media Company and its permitted licensees shall continue to have the right to fully exploit, use, and Exploit the HOFV Works for the length of the term of the license granted by PFHOF in connection with such HOFV Work pursuant to Section 2.3; provided that the length of the term of such license shall be a minimum of five (5) years.
